{"id":785015000,"lang":"csharp","lang_name":"C#","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1661636006,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"180 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/785015000/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"40.1 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    public int PivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        var leftSum = 0;\n            var rightSum = 0;\n            var currentPivot = 0;\n\n            foreach (var t in nums)\n            {\n                rightSum += t;\n            }\n\n\n            while (currentPivot < nums.Length)\n            {\n                rightSum -= nums[currentPivot];\n                if (leftSum == rightSum)\n                {\n                    return currentPivot;\n                }\n\n                leftSum += nums[currentPivot];\n                currentPivot++;\n            }\n\n            return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
